issues.message: Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "test-resource" 4 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "failed at creating webhook controller: %v" 6 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "istio.webhook.bar" 5 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "should not failed at upsertSecret, err: %v" 3 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "foo.ns" 14 times.
